Home › FAQ › Does MyCrypto support Bitcoin or other coins (LTC STEEM ZEC)?

Does MyCrypto support Bitcoin or other coins (LTC STEEM ZEC)?

"Can I send Bitcoin or other coins (LTC STEEM ZEC) to MyCrypto?"*

We support ETH, ETC, Testnet ETH, UBQ, EXP, RSK, MUSICOIN, and any Ethereum Standard Tokens - aka "ERC-20" Tokens.

You can use Shapeshift.io or another exchange to swap / convert / exchange your other coins into ETH or Ethereum Tokens. However, you do not send those other coins directly to your Ethereum address.

We recommend Exodus.io as a client-side, mutli-coin solution.

Here is a list of default ERC-20 tokens that MyCrypto supports (as of May 28, 2017). However, any ERC-20 token can be added to your local interface by following these instructions.

Related Reading

  • How can I add a non-default token to MyCrypto?

  • I am throwing a #FOMOFest (aka a token sale, token creation period, ICO) and want to add my token to MyCrypto for all my investors. What do I do?

MyCrypto.com MyCrypto Apps Help & Support Our Team Privacy

MyCrypto is an open-source, client-side tool for generating ether wallets, handling ERC-20 tokens, and interacting with the blockchain more easily. Developed by and for the community since 2015, we’re focused on building awesome products that put the power in people’s hands.
